title: Starting With Max: How a Wise Stray Dog Gave Me Strength and Inspiration
description: Starting a new life in a new city, in a new country, Ying Ying and her family adopt a stray dog, the much loved Max. As changes in Ying Ying's life bring frustration and sadness as well as surprise and joy, quite unexpectedly she realizes that what remains most constant in her life is her dog
author: Ying Ying
